Modules

 UART1
 

The UART module multiplexes differenct protocol on the MSB's UART1 interface.


Detailed Description

UART interface.

Author:
Michael Baar <baar@inf.fu-berlin.de>

UART switch for RS232 and SPI protocols on UART1 written for ScatterWeb MSB boards. Compatible to ScatterWeb EOS, ScatterWeb Bootload and Contiki.
